problems.eyebrow: The Hidden Cost of DIY Design
problems.title: DIY Design Is Costing You More Than You Think
problems.description: Most nonprofits don't have access to dedicated design support — so they make do. But homemade graphics come at a hidden cost: lost donations, lost time, and lost trust. That's exactly why we created the Design for Good Initiative.
problems.subtitle: We've seen it firsthand — and we're here to change it.

issues.title: Lost Donor Trust
issues.description: Amateur visuals cut donor trust by up to 68%

issues.title: Wasted Time
issues.description: Staff waste 7+ hours weekly on DIY design

issues.title: Reduced Impact
issues.description: Inconsistent branding reduces campaign performance by 35%
